author: deweese
msg: 1) The CSS engine now applies the 'all' media type to all content.
('all' media type is the default for @import).
2) The image transcoders now default w/h to 400x400 if they can't get

author: deweese
msg: Updated manifests and policy files for move to xerces_2_5_0

author: deweese
msg: 1) Better user notification when fetching a font face fails for
2) Improved the external resource access test.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Bugfix in parsing some TrueType fonts fixed (thanks to Eric Bloch).
2) I/O exceptions from loading images now reference the image element
3) Removed some now unused test files.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Infinate loop in selectSubString is fixed.
2) Text selection test now derives off JSVGRenderingAccuracy test so
the results are images with highlighted text.
